Edna Andrade's Twilight Wave (1973)

[Original art](https://www.locksgallery.com/exhibitions/edna-andrade-symmetries#2)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggforce)
```

The data below could definitly put into a dataframe to drastically reduce the number of lines of code.
However, I decided to keep it in this format so I could keep the comments I added to help deicpher the coordinates and colors of the circles. 

